GSP34yogsubhu:7: YBh_1.1(2): sa ca sārva-bhaumaś cittasya dharmaḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:11: tad eva rajas-leśamalāpetam svarūpapratiṣṭham sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātimātram dharmameghadhyāna-upagam bhavati...[prati-sthā]
GSP34yogsubhu:12: tat param prasaṃkhyānam ity ācakṣate dhyāyinaḥ...[ā-cakṣ]
GSP34yogsubhu:13: citiśaktir apariṇāminī+ apratisaṃkramā darśitaviṣayā śuddhā ca +..anantā ca sattvaguṇātmikā ca +..iyam ataḥ+ viparītā vivekakhyātir iti...[pariṇāma, pari-nam, vipari-i]
GSP34yogsubhu:14: atas tasyām viraktam cittam tām api khyātim niruṇaddhi...[vi-rañj, ni-rudh]
GSP34yogsubhu:17: YBh_1.2(6): na tatra kiṃcit samprajñāyata iti+ asamprajñātaḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:18: YBh_1.2(6): dvividhaḥ sa yogaś cittavṛttinirodha iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:21: tathā ca sūtram -- ”ekam eva darśanam khyātir eva darśanam” iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:22: cittam ayaskāntamaṇikalpam samnidhimātra-upakāri dṛśyatvena svam bhavati puruṣasya svāminaḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:25: YBh_1.5(10): tathājātīyakāḥ saṃskārā vṛttibhir eva kriyante...
GSP34yogsubhu:27: tad evambhūtam cittam avasitādhikāram ātmakalpena vyavatiṣṭhate pralayam vā gacchatīti...[ava-so, vyava-sthā]
GSP34yogsubhu:30: pratisaṃvedī puruṣa iti+ upariṣṭād upapādayiṣyāmaḥ...[pratisaṃveda, upa-pad]
GSP34yogsubhu:33: eta eva svasaṃjñābhis tamas +..mohaḥ +..mahāmohas tāmisraḥ +..andhatāmisra iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:38: yadā citir eva puruṣas tadā kim atra kena vyapadiśyate.[vyapa-diś]
GSP34yogsubhu:40: tathā anutpattidharmā puruṣa iti, utpattidharmasya +..abhāvamātram avagamyate na puruṣānvayī dharmaḥ...[ava-gam, anvaya]
GSP34yogsubhu:43: YBh_1.10(15): prasannam me manas+ prajñām me viśāradīkaroti...
GSP34yogsubhu:44: duhkham aham asvāpsam styānam me manas+ bhramaty anavasthitam...
GSP34yogsubhu:50: kim pratyayasya cittam smarati+ āhosvid viṣayasya +..iti...[smṛ]
GSP34yogsubhu:51: sa saṃskāraḥ svavyañjakāñjanas tadākārām eva grāhyagrahaṇa-ubhayātmikām smṛtim janayati...[jan]
GSP34yogsubhu:54: sā ca dvayī -- bhāvitasmartavyā ca +..abhāvitasmartavyā ca...
GSP34yogsubhu:59: cittanadī nāma +..ubhayatovāhinī vahati kalyāṇāya vahati pāpāya ca...
GSP34yogsubhu:60: yā tu kaivalyaprāgbhārā vivekaviṣayanimnā sā kalyāṇavahā.
GSP34yogsubhu:65: YBh_1.16(20): tatra yad uttaram tat+ jñānaprasādamātram.
GSP34yogsubhu:67: YBh_1.16(20): etasya +..eva hi na +..antarīyakam kaivalyam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:76: tadabhyāsapūrvakam hi cittam nirālambanam abhāvaprāptam iva bhavatīty eṣa nirbījaḥ samādhir asamprajñātaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:80: YBh_1.20(24): sā hi jananīva kalyāṇī yoginam pāti...
GSP34yogsubhu:81: tasya hi śraddadhānasya vivekārthino vīryam upajāyate...[śrad-dhā]
GSP34yogsubhu:85: tadabhyāsāt tattadviṣayāc ca vairāgyād asamprajñātaḥ samādhir bhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:86: YBh_1.21(24): te khalu nava yogino mṛdumadhyādhimātra-upāyā bhavanti.
GSP34yogsubhu:94: YBh_1.23(25): kim etasmād eva +..āsannatamaḥ samādhir bhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:96: praṇidhānād bhaktiviśeṣād āvarjita īśvaras tam anugṛhṇāty abhidhyānamātreṇa...[ā-vṛj, anu-grah]
GSP34yogsubhu:97: tadabhidhyānamātrād api yogina āsannatamaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalam ca bhavatīti.
GSP34yogsubhu:103: yathā muktasya pūrvā bandhakoṭiḥ prajñāyate na +..evam īśvarasya.
GSP34yogsubhu:104: yathā vā prakṛtilīnasya +..uttarā bandhakoṭiḥ sambhāvyate naivam īśravasya.
GSP34yogsubhu:105: sa tu sadā +..eva muktaḥ sadā +..eva +..īśvara iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:106: yo +asau prakṛṣṭasattva-upādānād īśvarasya śāśvatika utkarṣaḥ sa kim sanimitta āhosvin nirnimitta iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:109: etasmād etad bhavati sadā +..eva īśvaraḥ sadā +..eva mukta iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:111: YBh_1.24(28): yad eva +..atiśayi syāt tad eva tat syāt...[atiśaya]
GSP34yogsubhu:112: YBh_1.24(28): tasmād yatra kāṣṭhāprāptir aiśvaryasya sa īśvara iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:113: YBh_1.24(29): na ca tat samānam aiśvaryam asti.
GSP34yogsubhu:114: YBh_1.24(29): dvayoś ca tulyayor yugapatkāmitārthaprāptir nāsti.
GSP34yogsubhu:116: tasmād yasya sāmyātiśayair vinirmuktam aiśvaryam sa eva +īśvaraḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:120: yad idam atītānāgatapratyutpannapratyekasamuccayātīndriyagrahaṇam alpam bahu+ iti sarvajñabījam etad vivardhamānam yatra niratiśayam sa sarvajñaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:121: asti kāṣṭhāprāptiḥ sarvajñabījasya sātiśayatvāt parimāṇavad iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:122: YBh_1.25(30): yatra kāṣṭhāprāptir jñānasya sa sarvajñaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:128: kim asya saṃketakṛtam vācyavācakatvam atha pradīpaprakāśavad avasthitam iti...[ava-sthā]
GSP34yogsubhu:129: saṃketas tu+ īśravasya sthitam evārtham abhinayati...[abhi-nī]
GSP34yogsubhu:133: tad asya yoginaḥ praṇavam japataḥ praṇavārtham ca bhāvayataś cittam ekāgram sampadyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:137: YBh_1.30(34): atha ke +antarāyā ye cittasya vikṣepāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:138: YBh_1.30(34): ke punas te kiyanto vā +..iti..
GSP34yogsubhu:144: saṃśaya ubhayakoṭispṛgvijñānam syād idam evam naivam syād iti...[spṛś]
GSP34yogsubhu:146: YBh_1.30(34): ālasyam kāyasya cittasya ca gurutvād apravṛttiḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:148: ete cittavikṣepā nava yogamalā yogapratipakṣā yogāntarāyā iti+ abhidhīyante...[abhi-dhā]
GSP34yogsubhu:149: duhkham ādhyātmikam ādhibhautikam ādhidaivikam ca...[adhyātman, adhibhūta, adhidaiva]
GSP34yogsubhu:150: yenābhihatāḥ prāṇinas tadapaghātāya prayatante tad duhkham.(?)..
GSP34yogsubhu:152: YBh_1.31(35): yad aṅgāni+ ejayati kampayati tad aṅgamejayatvam.
GSP34yogsubhu:153: YBh_1.31(35): yat kauṣṭhyam vāyum nihsārayati sa praśvāsaḥ...[koṣṭhā]
GSP34yogsubhu:155: atha +..ete vikṣepāḥ samādhipratipakṣās tābhyām eva +..abhyāsavairāgyābhyām niroddhavyāḥ...[ni-rudh]
GSP34yogsubhu:156: YBh_1.32(35): tatra +..abhyāsasya viṣayam upasaṃharann idam āha..
GSP34yogsubhu:159: yasya tu pratyarthaniyatam pratyayamātram kṣaṇikam ca cittam tasya sarvam eva cittam ekāgram nāsty eva vikṣiptam.
GSP34yogsubhu:160: tasmād ekam anekārtham avasthitam cittam iti...[ava-sthā]
GSP34yogsubhu:161: kathaṃcit samādhīyamānam api+ etad gomayapāyasīyanyāyam ākṣipati...[ā-kṣip]
GSP34yogsubhu:162: YBh_1.32(38): tasmād ekam anekārtham avasthitam ca cittam.
GSP34yogsubhu:167: viṣayavatī vā pravṛttir utpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanī...[nibandhana]
GSP34yogsubhu:169_0: etena candrādityagrahamaṇipradīparaśmi-ādiṣu pravṛttir utpannā viṣayavaty eva veditavyā...yady
GSP34yogsubhu:169_1: api hi tattat-śāstrānumānācārya-upadeśair avagatam arthatattvam sadbhūtam eva bhavati...
GSP34yogsubhu:172: aniyatāsu vṛttiṣu tadviṣayāyām vaśīkārasaṃjñāyām upajātāyām samartham syāt tasya tasyārthasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāya +..iti...[pratyakṣa]
GSP34yogsubhu:174: pravṛttir utpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanīti+ anuvartate...[nibandhana, anu-vṛt]
GSP34yogsubhu:175: tathāsmitāyām samāpannam cittam nistaraṅgamahodadhikalpam śāntam anantam asmitāmātram bhavati...[udadhi]
GSP34yogsubhu:176: yatra idam uktam -- ”tam aṇumātram ātmānam anuvidyāsmīti+ evam tāvat samprajānīte” iti...[anu-vid, sampra-jñā]
GSP34yogsubhu:177: eṣā dvayī viśokā viṣayavatī, asmitāmātrā ca pravṛttir jyotiṣmatīti+ ucyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:178: YBh_1.36(41): yayā yoginaś cittam sthitipadam labhata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:180: vītarāgacittālambana-uparaktam vā yoginaś cittam sthitipadam labhata iti...[upa-rañj]
GSP34yogsubhu:182: svapnajñānālambanam vā nidrājñānālambanam vā tadākāram yoginaś cittam sthitipadam labhata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:184: YBh_1.39(42): yad evābhimatam tad eva dhyāyet.
GSP34yogsubhu:185: tatra labdhasthitikam anyatrāpi sthitipadam labhata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:186: tadvaśīkārāt paripūrṇam yoginaś cittam na punar abhyāsakṛtam parikarma +..apekṣata iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:187: atha labdhasthitikasya cetasaḥ kiṃsvarūpā kiṃviṣayā vā samāpattir iti, tad ucyate --...
GSP34yogsubhu:192: vibhajyamānāś cānye śabdadharmā anye +arthadharmā anye vijñānadharmā iti+ eteṣām vibhaktaḥ panthāḥ...[path]
GSP34yogsubhu:193_0: tatra samāpannasya yogino yo gavādyarthaḥ [gauh] samādhiprajñāyām samārūḍhaḥ sa cet
GSP34yogsubhu:198: YBh_1.43(47): yasya punar avastukaḥ sa pracayaviśeṣaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:199: YBh_1.43(48): tadā ca samyagjñānam api kim syād viṣayābhāvāt.
GSP34yogsubhu:200: YS_1.44(48):  etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā.
GSP34yogsubhu:201: tatrāpi+ ekabuddhinirgrāhyam eva +..uditadharmaviśiṣṭam bhūtasūkṣmālambanībhūtam samādhiprajñāyām upatiṣṭhate...[vi-śiṣ, ālambana, upa-sthā]
GSP34yogsubhu:202: prajñā ca svarūpaśūnyā +..iva +..arthamātrā yadā bhavati tadā nirvicārā +..ity ucyate...
GSP34yogsubhu:203: tatra mahadvastuviṣayā savitarkā nirvitarkā ca, sūkṣmavastuviṣayā savicārā nirvicārā ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:204: evam ubhayor etayā +..eva nirvitarkayā vikalpahānir vyākhyātā +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:211: YBh_1.45(50): na cāliṅgāt param sūkṣmam asti.
GSP34yogsubhu:212: YBh_1.45(50): nanu+ asti puruṣaḥ sūkṣma iti...satyam.
GSP34yogsubhu:213: yathā liṅgāt paramaliṅgasya saukṣmyam na ca +..evam puruṣasya.
GSP34yogsubhu:216: tasmin samāhitacittasya yā prajñā jāyate tasyā ṛtambharā +..iti saṃjñā bhavati...[samā-dhā, jan]
GSP34yogsubhu:221: yatra prāptis tatra gatir yatrāprāptis tatra na bhavati gatir iti+ uktam.
GSP34yogsubhu:222: tasmāt +..śrutānumānaprajñābhyām anyaviṣayā sā prajñā viśeṣārthatvād iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:224: YBh_1.50(53-54): tataś ca prajñā, tataś ca saṃskārā iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:225: katham asau saṃskārātiśayaś cittam sādhikāram na kariṣyatīti.
GSP34yogsubhu:226: na te prajñākṛtāḥ saṃskārāḥ kleśakṣayahetutvāc cittam adhikāraviśiṣṭam kurvanti.
GSP34yogsubhu:227: YBh_1.50(54): cittam hi te svakāryād avasādayanti...[ava-sad]
GSP34yogsubhu:229: kasmāt, nirodhajaḥ saṃskāraḥ samādhijān saṃskārān bādhata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:233: tac ca cittaprasādanam abādhamānam anenāsevyam iti manyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:237: sa hi+ āsevyamānaḥ samādhim bhāvayati kleśāṃś ca pratanūkaroti.
GSP34yogsubhu:238: pratanūkṛtān kleśān prasaṃkhyānāgninā dagdhabījakalpān aprasavadharmiṇaḥ kariṣyatīti...[dah]
GSP34yogsubhu:239: teṣām tanūkaraṇāt punaḥ kleśair aparāmṛṣṭā sattvapuruṣānyatāmātrakhyātiḥ sūkṣmā prajñā samāptādhikārā pratiprasavāya kalpiṣyata iti...[klp]
GSP34yogsubhu:240: YBh_2.3(59): atha ke kleśāḥ kiyanto vā +..iti..
GSP34yogsubhu:242: YBh_2.3(59): kleśā iti pañca viparyayā ity arthaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:245: YBh_2.4(60): ataḥ kṣīṇakleśaḥ kuśalaś caramadeha ity ucyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:246: tatra +..eva sā dagdhabījabhāvā pañcamī kleśāvasthā nānyatra +..iti...[dah]
GSP34yogsubhu:247: tathā vicchidya vicchidya tena tenātmanā punaḥ punaḥ samudācarantīti vicchinnāḥ...[vi-chid]
GSP34yogsubhu:250: yad avidyayā vastu+ ākāryate tad evānuśerate kleśā viparyāsapratyayakāla upalabhyante kṣīyamāṇām cāvidyām anukṣīyanta iti...[ā-kṛ, anu-śī]............
GSP34yogsubhu:252: tadyathā -- dhruvā pṛthivī, dhruvā sacandratārakā dyauh, amṛtā divaukasa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:253: “sthānād bījād upaṣṭambhān nihsyandān nidhanād api /..kāyam ādheyaśaucatvāt paṇḍitā hi+ aśucim viduh”...[ā-dhā]
GSP34yogsubhu:254_0: navā +..iva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyā +..iyam kanyā madhu-amṛtāvayavanirmitā +..iva candram
GSP34yogsubhu:254_1: bhittvā nihsṛtā +..iva jñāyate, nīla-utpalapattrāyatākṣī hāvagarbhābhyām locanābhyām
GSP34yogsubhu:256: eṣā catuṣpadā bhavaty avidyā mūlam asya kleśasaṃtānasya karmāśayasya ca savipākasya +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:258: evam avidyā na pramāṇam na pramāṇābhāvaḥ kiṃtu vidyāviparītam jñānāntaram avidyā +..iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:259: sarvasya prāṇina iyam ātmāśīr nityā bhavati mā na bhūvam bhūyāsam iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:262: kasmāt...samānā hi tayoḥ kuśalākuśalayor maraṇaduhkhānubhavād iyam vāsanā +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:267: YBh_2.12(68): tatra nārakāṇām nāsti dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśayaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:268: kṣīṇakleśānām api nāsty adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśaya iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:269: tatra +idam vicāryate -- kim ekam karma +..ekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam atha +..ekam karmānekam janmākṣipatīti.
GSP34yogsubhu:270: dvitīyā vicāraṇā -- kim anekam karmānekam janma nirvartayati athānekam karmaikam janma nirvartayatīti...[nir-vṛt]
GSP34yogsubhu:271: YBh_2.13(69): na tāvad ekam karma +..ekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam.
GSP34yogsubhu:272: YBh_2.13(69): na ca +..ekam karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam.
GSP34yogsubhu:273: YBh_2.13(70): na cānekam karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam.
GSP34yogsubhu:275: tac ca janma tena +..eva karmaṇā labdhāyuṣkam bhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:276: tasminn āyuṣi tena +..eva karmaṇā bhogaḥ sampadyata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:277: YBh_2.13(70): ata ekabhavikaḥ karmāśaya ukta iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:278_0: kleśakarmavipākānubhavanirvartitābhis tu vāsanābhir anādikālasammūrcchitam idam cittam
GSP34yogsubhu:278_1: vicitrīkṛtam iva sarvato matsyajālam granthibhir ivātatam ity etā anekabhavapūrvikā
GSP34yogsubhu:279: yas tu+ ayam karmāśaya eṣa eva +..ekabhavika ukta iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:280: yas tv asāv ekabhavikaḥ karmāśayaḥ sa niyatavipākaś cāniyatavipākaś ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:281: yatra +..idam uktam -- ”syāt svalpaḥ saṃkaraḥ saparihāraḥ sapratyavamarṣaḥ kuśalasya na +..apakarṣāya +..alam.
GSP34yogsubhu:283_0: yat tv adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyam karmāniyatavipākam tan naśyed āvāpam vā gacched abhibhūtam
GSP34yogsubhu:283_1: vā ciram apy upāsīta, yāvat samānam karmābhivyañjakam nimittam asya na vipākābhimukham
GSP34yogsubhu:284: tadvipākasyaiva deśakālanimittānavadhāraṇād iyam karmagatiś citrā durvijñānā ca +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:286: te janmāyuṣ-bhogāḥ puṇyahetukāḥ sukhaphalā apuṇyahetukā duhkhaphalā iti...
GSP34yogsubhu:288: pariṇāmatāpasaṃskāraduhkhair guṇavṛttivirodhāc ca duhkham eva sarvam vivekinaḥ..
GSP34yogsubhu:290: sarvasyāyam rāgānuviddhaś cetanācetanasādhanādhīnaḥ sukhānubhava iti tatrāsti rāgajaḥ karmāśayaḥ...[anu-vyadh]
GSP34yogsubhu:292: YBh_2.15(75): yā laulyād anupaśāntis tad duhkham.
GSP34yogsubhu:293: kasmāt, yato bhogābhyāsam anuvivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni ca +..indriyāṇām iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:294: YBh_2.15(75): tasmād anupāyaḥ sukhasya bhogābhyāsa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:295: eṣā pariṇāmaduhkhatā nāma pratikūlā sukhāvasthāyām api yoginam eva kliśnāti.
GSP34yogsubhu:296: atha kā tāpaduhkhatā, sarvasya dvesānuviddhaś cetanācetanasādhanādhīnas tāpānubhava iti tatrāsti dveṣajaḥ karmāśayaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:297: YBh_2.15(77): guṇavṛttivirodhāc ca duhkham eva sarvam vivekinaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:298: YBh_2.15(77): tasmād duhkham eva sarvam vivekina iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:299: YBh_2.15(77): tad asya mahato duhkhasamudāyasya prabhavabījam avidyā.
GSP34yogsubhu:302: YBh_2.16(78): tad etat-śāstram caturvyūham ity abhidhīyate..
GSP34yogsubhu:305: tasmād yad eva heyam ity ucyate tasyaiva kāraṇam pratinirdiśyate..
GSP34yogsubhu:308: YBh_2.17(81): atrāpi tāpakasya rajasaḥ sattvam eva tapyam.
GSP34yogsubhu:315: tat tu nāprayojanam api tu prayojanam urarīkṛtya pravartata iti bhogāpavargārtham hi tad dṛśyam puruṣasya +..iti...[pra-vṛt]
GSP34yogsubhu:316: YBh_2.18(83): dvayor atiriktam anyad darśanam nāsti.
GSP34yogsubhu:318: tathā śrotratvac-cakṣurjihvāghrāṇāni buddhhīndriyāṇi, vāc-pāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ karmendriyāṇi, ekādaśam manas+ sarvārtham, ity etāny asmitālakṣaṇasyāviśeṣasya viśeṣāḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:319: YBh_2.19(86): na tasyāḥ puruṣārthatā kāraṇam bhavatīti.
GSP34yogsubhu:321: guṇās tu sarvadharmānupātino na pratyastam ayante na +..upajāyante...[anupāta, anupātin]
GSP34yogsubhu:322: vyaktibhir evātītānāgatavyayāgamavatībhir guṇānvayinībhir upajananāpāyadharmakā iva pratyavabhāsante...[anvaya]
GSP34yogsubhu:324: na viśeṣa-bhyaḥ param tattvāntaram astīti viśeṣāṇām nāsti tattvāntarapariṇāmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:326: dṛśimātra iti dṛkśaktir eva viśeṣaṇāparāmṛṣṭā +..ity arthaḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:330: na hi buddhiś ca nāma puruṣaviṣayaś ca syād agṛhītā gṛhītā ca +..iti siddham puruṣasya sadājñātaviṣayatvam...tataś cāpariṇāmitvam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:331: kim ca parārthā buddhiḥ saṃhatyakāritvāt [saṃhati?], svārthaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:335: YS_2.22(90): kṛtārtham prati naṣṭam apy anaṣṭam tadanyasādhāraṇatvāt.
GSP34yogsubhu:336: kṛtārtham ekam puruṣam prati dṛśyam naṣṭam api nāśam prāptam apy anaṣṭam tadanyapuruṣasādhāraṇatvāt.
GSP34yogsubhu:337: tathā ca +..uktam -- dharmiṇām anādisamyogād dharmamātrāṇām apy anādiḥ samyoga iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:339: YBh_2.23(91): tasmāt samyogād dṛśyasya +..upalabdhir yā sa bhogaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:340: darśanakāryāvasānaḥ samyoga iti darśanam viyogasya kāraṇam uktam.
GSP34yogsubhu:341: darśanam adharśanasya pratidvandvī [dvandra] +..ity adarśanam samyoganimittam uktam.
GSP34yogsubhu:342: nātra darśanam mokṣakāraṇam adarśanābhāvād eva bandhābhāvaḥ sa mokṣa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:343: kiṃca +..idam adarśanam nāma, kim guṇānām adhikāra āhosvid dṛśirūpasya svāmino darśitaviṣayasya pradhānacittasyānutpādaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:345: ubhayathā cāsya vṛttiḥ pradhānavyavahāram labhate nānyathā.
GSP34yogsubhu:346: YBh_2.23(93): ubhayasyāpy adarśanam dharma ity eke.
GSP34yogsubhu:347: darśanam jñānam evādarśanam iti kecid abhidadhati...[abhi-dhā]
GSP34yogsubhu:352: viparyayajñānavāsanāvāsitā ca na kāryaniṣṭhām puruṣakhyātim buddhiḥ prāpnoti sādhikārā punar āvartate...[ava-so, ā-vṛt]
GSP34yogsubhu:353: sā tu puruṣakhyātiparyavasānām kāryaniṣṭhām prāpnoti, caritādhikārā nivṛttādarśanā bandhakāraṇābhāvān na punar āvartate...[ā-vṛt]
GSP34yogsubhu:354: tathā +..idam vidyamānam jñānam cittanivṛttim na karoti, vinaṣṭam kariṣyatīti kā pratyāśā.
GSP34yogsubhu:356: tatra cittanivṛttir eva mokṣah, kimartham asthāna evāsya mativibhramaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:357: heyam duhkham heyakāranam ca samyogākhyam sanimittam uktam...ataḥ param hānam vaktavyam..
GSP34yogsubhu:359: YBh_2.26(96): atha hānasya kaḥ prāpti-upāya iti..
GSP34yogsubhu:364: tadyathā -- parijñātam heyam nāsya punaḥ parijñeyam asti.
GSP34yogsubhu:366: YBh_2.27(98): eṣā catuṣṭayī kāryā vimuktiḥ prajñāyāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:367: YBh_2.27(98): cittavimuktis tu trayī caritādhikārā buddhiḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:368: na caiṣām pravilīnānām punar asty utpādaḥ prayojanābhāvād iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:369: etasyām avasthāyām guṇasambandhātītaḥ svarūpamātrajyotir amalaḥ kevalī puruṣa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:370: etām saptadhām prāntabhūmiprajñānam anupaśyan puruṣaḥ kuśala ity ākhyāyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:372: yathā yathā ca sādhanāny anuṣṭhīyante tathā tathā tanutvam aśuddhir āṣadyate...[anu-sthā, ā-sad]
GSP34yogsubhu:373: yathā yathā ca kṣīyate tathā tathā kṣayakramānurodhinī jñānasyāpi dīptir vivardhate...[anurodha, vi-vṛdh]
GSP34yogsubhu:377: tatra +..utpattikāraṇam manas+ bhavati vijñānasya, sthitikāraṇam manasaḥ puruṣārthatā, śarīrasya +..ivāhāra iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:378: abhivyaktikāraṇam yathā rūpasyālokas tathā rūpajñānam, vikārakāraṇam manaso viṣayāntaram.
GSP34yogsubhu:384: mahābhūtāni śarīrāṇām, tāni ca parasparam sarveṣām tairyagyaunamānuṣadaivatāni ca parasparārthatvād ity evam nava kāraṇāni.
GSP34yogsubhu:385: yogāṅgānuṣṭhānam tu dvidhā +..eva kāraṇatvam labhata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:387: YBh_2.29(102): yathākramam eṣām anuṣṭhānam svarūpam ca vakṣyāmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:390: YBh_2.30(102): tatrāhiṃsā sarvathā sarvadā sarvabhūtānām anabhidrohaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:392_0: tathā ca +..uktam -- sa khalv ayam brāhmaṇo yathā yathā vratāni bahūni samāditsate
GSP34yogsubhu:392_1: tathā tathā pramādakṛta-bhyo hiṃsānidāna-bhyo nivartamānas tām evāvadātarūpām ahiṃsām
GSP34yogsubhu:393: yathā dṛṣṭam yathānumitam tathā vāc+ manaś ca +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:395: YBh_2.30(103): tasmāt parīkṣya sarvabhūtahitam satyam brūyāt.
GSP34yogsubhu:396: steyam aśāstrapūrvakam dravyāṇām parataḥ svīkaraṇam, tatpratiṣedhaḥ punar aspṛhārūpam asteyam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:398: viṣayāṇām arjanarakṣaṇakṣayasaṅgahiṃsādoṣadarśanād asvīkaraṇam aparigraha ity ete yamāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:401: YBh_2.31(104): yathā kṣatriyāṇām yuddha eva hiṃsā nānyatra +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:403: tatra śaucam mṛd-jalādijanitam medhyābhyavaharaṇādi ca bāhyam.
GSP34yogsubhu:408: tatra hiṃsā tāvat -- kṛtā kāritānumoditā +..iti tridhā.
GSP34yogsubhu:409: YBh_2.34(106): lobhakrodhamohāḥ punas trividhā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:410: YBh_2.34(106): evam saptaviṃśatir bhedā bhavanti hiṃsāyāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:411: mṛdumadhyādhimātrāḥ punas tridhā -- mṛdumṛdur madhyamṛdus tīvramṛdur iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:413: sā punar niyamavikalpasamuccyabhedād asaṃkhyeyā, prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvād iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:415: te khalv amī vitarkā duhkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam.
GSP34yogsubhu:416: duhkham ajñānam cānantam phalam yeṣām iti pratipakṣabhāvanam.
GSP34yogsubhu:417: tathā ca hiṃsakas tāvat prathamam vadhyasya vīryam ākṣipati.
GSP34yogsubhu:419: tato vīryākṣepād asya cetanācetanam upakaraṇam kṣīṇavīryam bhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:420: YBh_2.34(107): evam anṛtādiṣv api yojyam yathāsambhavam.
GSP34yogsubhu:427: YBh_2.38(108): yasya lābhād apratighān guṇān utkarṣayati...[ut-kṛś]
GSP34yogsubhu:430_0: kiṃca parair asaṃsargaḥ kāyasvabhāvāvalokī svam api kāyam jihāsur [hā] mṛd-jalādibhir
GSP34yogsubhu:430_1: ākṣālayann [ā-kṣal] api kāyaśudhim apaśyan katham parakāyair atyantam evāprayataiḥ
GSP34yogsubhu:441_0: tadyathā padmāsanam bhadrāsanam svastikam daṇḍāsanam sa-upāśrayam paryaṅkam krauñcaniṣadanam
GSP34yogsubhu:441_1: hastiniṣadanam uṣṭraniṣadanam samasaṃsthānam sthirasukham yathāsukham ca +..iti+
GSP34yogsubhu:445: YS_2.49(111): tasmin sati śvāsapraśvāsayor gativicchedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:447: tṛtīyaḥ stambhavṛttir yatra +..ubhayābhāvaḥ sakṛṭ prayatnād bhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:448: saṃkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭā etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ prathama udghātas tadvat+ nigṛhītasya +..etāvadbhir dvitīya udghāta evam tṛtīyaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:449: evam mṛdur evam madhya evam tīvra iti saṃkhyāparidṛṣṭaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:456: tad asya prakāśāvaraṇam karma saṃsāranibandhanam prāṇāyāmābhyāsād durbalam bhavati pratikṣaṇam ca kṣīyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:458: “tapas+ na param prāṇāyāmāt tato viśuddhir malānām dīptiś ca jñānasya” iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:461: prāṇāyāmābhyāsād eva...”pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyām vā prāṇasya” iti vacanāt.
GSP34yogsubhu:464: YBh_2.55(116): śabdādiṣv avyasanam indriyajaya iti kecit.
GSP34yogsubhu:465: YBh_2.55(116): saktir vyasanam vyasyaty enam śreyasa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:466: aviruddhā sukhaduhkhaśūnyam śabdādijñānam indriyajaya iti kecit.
GSP34yogsubhu:472: YS_3.3(119): tad evārthamātranirbhāsam svarūpaśūnyam iva samādhiḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:474: YBh_3.4(120): tad etad dhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayam ekatra samyamaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:475: YBh_3.4(120): ekaviṣayāṇi trīṇi sādhanāni samyayama iti+ ucyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:476: YBh_3.4(120): tad asya trayasya tāntrikī paribhāṣā samyama iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:479: na hi+ ajitādharabhūmir anantarabhūmim vilaṅghya prāntabhūmiṣu samyamam labhate.
GSP34yogsubhu:480: YBh_3.6(121): tadabhāvāc ca kutas tasya prajñālokaḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:485: nirodhakṣaṇam cittam anveti [anu-i] tad ekasya cittasya pratikṣaṇam idam saṃskārānyathātvam nirodhapariṇāmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:490: YBh_3.11(123): sarvārthatāyāḥ kṣayas tirobhāva iti+ arthaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:491: YBh_3.11(123-124): ekāgratāyā udaya ābhirbhāva iti+ arthaḥ...
GSP34yogsubhu:493: samāhitacittasya pūrvapratyayaḥ śānta uttaras tatsadṛśa uditah,samādhicittam ubhayor anugatam punas tathā +..evāsamādhibhreṣād iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:494: YBh_3.12(124): sa khalv ayam dharmiṇaś cittasya +..ekāgratāpariṇāmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:496: lakṣaṇapariṇāmaś ca...nirodhas trilakṣaṇas tribhir adhvan-bhir yuktaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:498: tathā vyutthānam trilakṣaṇam tribhir adhvan-bhir yuktam vartamānalakṣaṇam hitvā dharmatvam anatikrāntam atītalakṣaṇam pratipannam.
GSP34yogsubhu:500: evam punar vyutthānam upasampadyamānam anāgatalakṣaṇam hitvā dharmatvam anatikrāntam vartamānalakṣaṇam pratipannam.
GSP34yogsubhu:501: YBh_3.13(125): na cātītānāgatābhyām lakṣaṇābhyām viyuktam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:502: YBh_3.13(125): evam punar nirodha evam punar vyutthānam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:504: evam dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmaiḥ śūnyam na kṣaṇam api guṇavṛttam avatiṣṭhate.
GSP34yogsubhu:506: YBh_3.13(126): guṇasvābhāvyam tu pravṛttikāraṇam uktam guṇānām iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:507: YBh_3.13(126): paramārthatas tv eka eva pariṇāmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:508: yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvānyathākriyamāṇasya bhāvānyathātvam bhavati na suvarṇānyathātvam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:511: saṃsargāc cāsya saukṣmyam, saukṣmyāc cānupalabdhir iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:513: uktam ca rūpātiśayā vṛtti-atiśayāś ca virudhyante, sāmānyāni tv atiśayaiḥ saha pravartante...[pra-vṛt]
GSP34yogsubhu:514: yathā saṃsthānam ādimat+ dharmamātram śabdādīnām guṇānām vināśyavināśinām evam liṅgam ādimat+ dharmamātram sattvādīnām guṇānām vināśyavināśinā tasmin vikārasaṃjñā +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:515: ta ete dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā dharmisvarūpam anatikrāntā ity eka eva pariṇāmaḥ sarvān amūn viśeṣān abhiplavate...[abhi-plu]
GSP34yogsubhu:518: YBh_3.14(132): yogyatāvacchinnā dharmiṇaḥ śaktir eva dharmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:519: tatra vartamānaḥ svavyāpāram anubhavan dharmī dharmāntara-bhyaḥ śānta-bhyaś cāvyapadeśya-bhyaś ca bhidyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:520_0: tatra ye khalu dharmiṇo dharmāḥ śāntā uditā avyapadeśyāś ca +..iti, tatra śāntā ye
GSP34yogsubhu:520_1: kṛtvā vyāpārānuparatāḥ savyāpārā uditās te cānāgatasya lakṣaṇasya samanantarā vartamānasyānantarā
GSP34yogsubhu:520_2: atītāḥ kimartham atītasyānantarā na bhavanti vartamānāh, pūrvapaścimatā na +..evam
GSP34yogsubhu:522: yatra +..uktam -- jalabhūmi-oḥ pāriṇāmikam rasādivaiśvarūpyam sthāvara-ṣu dṛṣṭam.
GSP34yogsubhu:523: deśakālākāranimitāpabandhān na khalu samānakālam ātmanām abhivyaktir iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:524: yasya tu dharmamātram eva +..idam niranvayam tasya bhogābhāvaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:527: piṇḍaḥ pracyavate ghaṭa upajāyata iti dharmapariṇāmakramaḥ...[pra-cyu, upa-jan]
GSP34yogsubhu:528: kasmāt...pūrvaparatāyām satyām samanantaratvam, sā tu nāsti+ atītasya...tasmād dvayor eva lakṣaṇayoḥ kramaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:529: YBh_3.15(135): cittasya dvaye dharmā paridṛṣṭāś cāparidṛṣṭāś ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:534: tena pariṇāmatrayam sākṣātkriyamāṇam atītānāgatajñānam teṣu sampādayati...
GSP34yogsubhu:538: varṇā ekasamayāsambhavitvāt parasparaniranugrahātmānas te padam asaṃspṛśyānupasthāpyāvirbhūtās tirobhūtāś ca +..iti pratyekam apadasvarūpā ucyante.
GSP34yogsubhu:539: YBh_3.17(142): ya eṣām pravibhāgajñaḥ sa sarvavit.
GSP34yogsubhu:540: YBh_3.17(142): tathā na hy asādhanā kriyāstīti.
GSP34yogsubhu:542: tadyathā śvetate prāsāda iti kriyārthah, śvetaḥ prāsāda iti kārakārthaḥ śabdah, kriyākarakātmā tadarthaḥ pratyayaś ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:543: kasmāt...so +ayam ity abhisambandhād ekākāra eva pratyayaḥ saṃketa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:544: evam tatpravibhāgasamyamād yoginaḥ sarvabhūtarutajñānam sampadyata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:548: na ca deśakālanimittanubhavair vinā teṣām asti sākṣātkaraṇam.
GSP34yogsubhu:549: tad ittham saṃskārasākṣātkaraṇāt pūrvajātijñānam utpadyate yoginaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:552: yad idam āyus-mataḥ pradhānavaśitvam anuttamam ca saṃtoṣasukham kim idam api duhkhapakṣa nikṣiptam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:553: tṛṣṇāduhkhasaṃtāpāpagamāt tu prasannam abādham sarvānukūlam sukham idam uktam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:557: sa-upakramam nirupakramam ca karma tatsamyamād aparāntajñānam ariṣṭa-bhyo vā.
GSP34yogsubhu:558: āyus-vipākam karma dvividham sa-upakramam nirupakramam ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:559: yathā ca tad eva sampiṇḍitam cireṇa saṃśuṣyed evam nirupakramam.
GSP34yogsubhu:560: tadā +..ekabhavikam āyus-karam karma dvividham sa-upakramam nirupakramam ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:562: ariṣṭa-bhyo vā +..iti...trividham ariṣṭam ādhyātmikam ādhibhautikam ādhidaivikam ca +..iti...[adhyātman, adhibhūta, adhidaiva.]
GSP34yogsubhu:563: tathā +..ādhibautikam yamapuruṣān paśyati, pitṝn atītān akasmāt paśyati.
GSP34yogsubhu:564: tathā +..ādhidaivikam svargam akasmāt siddhān vā paśyati.
GSP34yogsubhu:565: viparītam vā sarvam iti...anena vā jānāty aparāntam upasthitam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:567: bhāvanātaḥ samādhir yaḥ sa samyamas tato balāny avandhyavīryāṇi jāyante.
GSP34yogsubhu:568: tataś ca tasyām nāsti samādhir ity ato na balam upekṣātas tatra samyamābhāvād iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:572: yatra svakarma-upārjitaduhkhavedanāḥ prāṇinaḥ kaṣṭam āyus+ dīrgham ākṣipya jāyante.
GSP34yogsubhu:575: YBh_3.26(146): tasya sūryapracārād rātriṃdivam lagnam iva vartate.
GSP34yogsubhu:576: tasya nīlaśvetaśṛṅgavanta udīcīnās trayaḥ parvatā dvisāhasrāyāmāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:578: tataś ca dviguṇā dviguṇāḥ śākakuśakrauñcaśālmalagomedha(plakṣa) puṣkaradvīpāh, samudrāś ca sarṣaparāśikalpāḥ savicitraśailāvataṃsā ikṣurasasurāsarpis-dadhimaṇḍakṣīrasvādūdakāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:579: sumerus tridaśānām udyānabhūmiḥ...tatra miśravanam nandanam caitraratham sumānasam ity udyānāni.
GSP34yogsubhu:581: māhendranivāsinaḥ ṣaḍdevanikāyāḥ -- tridaśā agniṣvāttā yāmyās tuṣitā aparinirmitavaśavartinaḥ parinirmitavaśavartinaś ca +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:582: tatra +..acyutāḥ savitarkadhyānasukhāh, śuddhanivāsāḥ savicāradhyānasukhāh, satyābhā ānandamātradhyānasukhāh, saṃjñāsaṃjñinaś cāsmitāmātradhyānasukhāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:583: YBh_3.26(152): ta ete sapta lokāḥ sarva eva brahmalokāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:588: ādarśād divyarūpasaṃvit...āsvādād divyarasasaṃvit...vārtāto divyagandhavijñānam ity etāni nityam jāyante.
GSP34yogsubhu:591: YS_3.39(157): uddānajayāj jalapaṅkakaṇṭakādiṣv asaṅga utkrāntiś ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:592: samasta-indriyavṛttiḥ prāṇādilakṣaṇā jīvanam, tasya kriyā pañcatayī prāṇo mukhanāsikāgatir āhṛdayavṛttiḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:594: eṣām pradhānam prāṇaḥ...udānajayāj jalapaṅkakaṇṭakādiṣv asaṅga utkrāntiś ca prāyaṇakāle bhavati...tām vaśitvena pratipadyate.
GSP34yogsubhu:596: YBh_3.40(158): jitasamānas tejasa upadhmānam kṛtvā jvalayati.
GSP34yogsubhu:598: sarvaśrotrāṇām ākāśam pratiṣṭhā sarvaśabdānām ca...yathā +..uktam -- tulyadeśaśravaṇānām ekakdeśaśrutitvam sarveṣām bhavatīti...tac caitad ākāśasya liṅgam.
GSP34yogsubhu:599: anāvaraṇam ca +..uktam...tathāmūrtasyānāvaraṇadarśanād vibhutvam api prakhyātam ākāśasya.
GSP34yogsubhu:602: yā tu śarīranirapekṣā bahirbhūtasyaiva manaso bahirvṛttiḥ sā khalv akalpitā...tatra kalpitayā sādhayanty akalpitām mahāvidehām iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:604: asya sāmānyasya śabdādayo viśeṣāḥ...tathā ca +..uktam -- ekajātisamanvitānām eṣām dharmamātravyāvṛttir iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:605: sa ca bhedābhedavivakṣitaḥ...āṃrāṇām vanam brāhmaṇānām saṃgha āṃravaṇam brāhmaṇasaṃgha iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:607: tatrāṇimā bhavaty aṇuḥ...laghimā laghur bhavati...mahimā mahān bhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:610: tasya sāmānyasya +..indriyāṇi viśeṣāḥ...caturtham rūpam vyavasāyātmakāḥ prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlā guṇā yeṣām indriyāṇi sāhaṃkārāṇi pariṇāmaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:611: pañcasv eteṣv indriyarūpeṣu yathākramam samyamas tatra tatra jayam kṛtvā pañcarūpajayād indriyajayaḥ prādurbhavati yoginaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:612: YS_3.48(167): tato manojavitvam vikaraṇabhāvaḥ pradhānajayaś ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:614: evam asya tato virajyamānasya yāni kleśabījāni dagdhaśālibījakalpāny aprasavasamarthāni tāni saha manasā pratyastam gacchanti.
GSP34yogsubhu:616: tatkṣaṇa-upārūḍhāḥ khalv amī sarve dharmāḥ...tayoḥ kṣaṇatatkramayoḥ samyamāt tayoḥ sākṣātkaraṇam...tataś ca vivekajam jñānam prādurbhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:618: kṣaṇabhedas tu yogibuddhigamya eva +..iti...ata uktam mūrtivyavadhijātibhedābhāvān nāsti mūlapṛthaktvam iti vārṣagaṇyaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:619: tārakam sarvaviṣayam sarvathāviṣayam akramam ca +..iti vivekajam jñānam.
GSP34yogsubhu:620: tārakam iti svapratibhā-uttham anaupadeśikam ity arthaḥ...sarvaviṣayam nāsya kiṃcid aviṣayībhūtam ity arthaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:621: sarvathāviṣayam atītānāgatapratyutpannam sarvam paryāyaiḥ sarvathā jānātīty arthaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:623_1: bhavati tadā puruṣasya buddhisārūpyam ivāpannam bhavati, tadā puruṣasya +..upacaritabhogābhāvaḥ
GSP34yogsubhu:624: etasyām avasthāyām kaivalyam bhavatīśvarasyānīśvarasya vā vivekajajñānabhāgina itarasya vā.
GSP34yogsubhu:628: nimittam aprayojakam prakṛtīnām varaṇabhedas tu tatāḥ kṣetrikavat.
GSP34yogsubhu:629: yathā vā sa eva kṣetrikas tasminn eva kedāre na prabhavati+ audakān bhaumān vā rasān dhānyamūlāni+ anupraveśayitum, kim tarhi mudgagavedhukaśyāmākādīṃs tato +apakarṣati.
GSP34yogsubhu:631: asmitāmātram cittakāraṇam upādāya nirmāṇacittāni karoti, tataḥ sacittāni bhavantīti.
GSP34yogsubhu:632: YS_4.5(179): pravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittam ekam anekeṣām
GSP34yogsubhu:633: bahūnām cittānām katham ekacittābhiprāyapurahsarā pravṛttir iti sarvacittānām prayojakam cittam ekam nirmimīte, tataḥ pravṛttibhedaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:637: catuṣpadī khalv iyam karmajātiḥ...kṛṣṇā śuklakṛṣṇā śuklāśuklākṛṣṇā ca +..iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:638: YBh_4.7(180): tatra kṛṣṇā durātmanām, śuklakṛṣṇā bahihsādhanasādhyā.
GSP34yogsubhu:640: aśuklākṛṣṇā samnyāsinām kṣīṇakleśānām carmadehānām iti...tatrāśuklam yogina eva phalasamnyāsad akṛṣṇam cānupādānāt...itareṣām tu bhūtānām pūrvam eva trividham iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:642: tata iti trividhāt karmanah, tadvipākānuguṇānām eveti yajjātīyasya karmaṇo yo vipākas tasyānuguṇā yā vāsanāḥ karmavipākam anuśerate tāsām evābhivyaktiḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:645: kasmāt, yato vyavahitānām apy āsām sadṛśam karmābhivyajñakam nimittībhūtam [nimitta] ity ānantaryam eva...
GSP34yogsubhu:646: kutaś ca, smṛtisaṃskārayor ekarūpatvāt...yathānubhavās tathā saṃskārāḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:647: te ca karmavāsanānurūpāḥ...yathā ca vāsanās tathā smṛtir iti jātideśakālavyavahita-bhyaḥ saṃskāra-bhyaḥ smṛtiḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:649: tāsām vbāsanānām āśiṣo nityatvād anāditvam...yeyam ātmāśīr mā na bhūvam bhūyāsam iti....sarvasya dṛśyate sā na svābhāvikī.
GSP34yogsubhu:650: tasmād anādivāsanānuviddham idam cittam nimittavaśāt kāścid eva vāsanāḥ pratilabhya puruṣasya bhogāya +..upāvartata iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:651: ghaṭaprāsādapradīpakalpam saṃkocavikāsi cittam śarīraparimāṇākāramātram ity apare pratipannāḥ...tathā cāntarābhāvaḥ saṃsāraś ca yukta iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:652: vṛttir evāsya vibhunaś cittasya saṃkocavikāsinīty ācāryaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:653: tac ca dharmādinimittāpekṣam...nimittam ca dvividham -- bāhyam ādhyātmikam ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:654: śarīrādisādhanāpekṣam bāhyam stutidānābhivādanādi, cittamātrādhīnam śraddhādi+ adhyātmikam.
GSP34yogsubhu:656: phalam tu yam āśritya yasya pratyutpannatā dharmādeh, na hy apūrva-upajanaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:657: yad abhimukhībhūtam vastu yām vāsanām vyanakti tasyās tadālambanam.
GSP34yogsubhu:658: evam hetuphalāśrayālambanair etaiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ sarvā vāsanāḥ...eṣām abhāve tatsaṃśrayāṇām api vāsanānām abhāvaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:659: nāsty asataḥ sambhavah, na cāsti sato vināśa iti dravyatvena sambhavantyaḥ katham nivartiṣyante vāsanā iti..
GSP34yogsubhu:660: YS_4.12(186): atītānāgatam svarūpatas+ asti+ adhvabhedād dharmāṇām..
GSP34yogsubhu:661: bhaviṣyat-vyaktikam anāgatam anubhūtavyaktikam atītam svavyāpāra-upārūḍham vartamānam, trayam caitad vastu jñānasya jñeyam.
GSP34yogsubhu:662: yadi caitat svarūpatas+ nābhaviṣyat+ na +..idam nirviṣayam jñānam udapatsyata.
GSP34yogsubhu:664: yadā tu sarve guṇāḥ katham ekaḥ śabda ekam indriyam iti..
GSP34yogsubhu:667: bahucaittālambanībhūtam [ālambana] ekam vastu sādhāranam, tat khalu naikacittaparikalpitam nāpy anekacittaparikalpitam kiṃtu svapratiṣṭham.
GSP34yogsubhu:668: nimitānurūpasya ca pratyayasya +..utpadyamānasya tena tenātmanā hetur bhavati.
GSP34yogsubhu:670: na ca +..ekacittatantram vastu tadapramāṇakam tadā kim syāt..
GSP34yogsubhu:672: ayaskāntamaṇikalpā viṣayā ayas +..sadharmakam cittam abhisambandhya(?):+ uparañjanti.
GSP34yogsubhu:673: YBh_4.18(193): yasya tu tad eva cittam viṣayas tasya..
GSP34yogsubhu:674: syād āśaṅkā cittam eva svābhāsam viṣayābhāsam ca bhaviṣyatīty agnivat --..
GSP34yogsubhu:676: yathā +..itarāṇīndriyāṇi śabdādayaś ca dṛśyatvān na svābhāsāni tathā manas +..api pratyetavyam.
GSP34yogsubhu:678: smṛtisaṃkaraś ca, yāvantaḥ+ buddhibuddhīnām anubhavās tāvatyaḥ smṛtayaḥ prāpnuvanti.
GSP34yogsubhu:679: tatsaṃkarāc ca +..ekasmṛti-anavadhāraṇam ca syād ity evam buddhipratisaṃvedinam [pratisaṃvedana] puruṣam apalapadbhir vaināśikaiḥ sarvam evākulītṛtam.
GSP34yogsubhu:684: anupampanīyās te...kasmāt, asti hi teṣām bhrāntibījam sarvarūpākāranirbhāsam cittam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:685: evam grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyasvarūpacittabhedāt trayam apy etaj jātitaḥ pravibhajante te samyagdarśinas tair adhigataḥ puruṣaḥ.
GSP34yogsubhu:689: sā tu viśeṣadarśino nivartate...kutaḥ...cittasya +..eva +..eṣa vicitraḥ pariṇāmah, puruṣas tv asatyām avidyāyām śuddhaś cittadharmair aparāmṛṣṭa iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:692: tadānīm yad asya cittam viṣayaprāgbhāram ajñānanimnam āsīt tad asyānyathā bhavati kaivalyaprāgbhāram vivekajajñānanimnam iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:694: jñānasaṃskārās tu cittādhikārasamāptim anuśerate [anu-śī] iti an cintyante.
GSP34yogsubhu:696: tallābhād avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ samūlakāṣam kaṣitā bhavanti...kuśalākuśalāś ca karmāśayāḥ samūlaghātam hatā bhavanti.
GSP34yogsubhu:699: tatra yadā sarvair āvaraṇamalair apagatam bhavati tadā bhavati+ asyānantyam.
GSP34yogsubhu:702: tasya dharmameghasya +..udayāt kṛtārthānām guṇānām pariṇāmakramaḥ parisamāpyate...na hi kṛtabhogāpavargāḥ parisamāptakramāḥ kṣaṇam apy avasthātum utsahante.
GSP34yogsubhu:703: dvayī ca +..iyam nityatā kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatā ca.
GSP34yogsubhu:705: puruṣārthaśūnyānām guṇānām pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyam svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktir iti.
GSP34yogsubhu:706_0: kṛtabhogāpavargāṇām puruṣārthaśūnyānām yaḥ pratiprasavaḥ kāryakāraṇātmakānām guṇānām
GSP34yogsubhu:706_1: tat kaivalyam, svarūpapratiṣṭhā punar buddhisattvānabhisambandhāt puruṣasya citiśaktir
GSP34yogsubhu:706_2: eva kevalā, tasyāḥ sadā tathā +..eva +..avasthānam kaivalyam iti.
